title: Índice de Vulnerablidad Social
text:
Prefacio
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introducción
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.
Para el caso del Índice de vulnerabilidad social, es importante tener en cuenta los trabajos de Spielman et al. (2020) y Mah et al. (2023).




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.


Mah, Jasmine Cassy, Jodie Lynn Penwarden, Henrique Pott, Olga Theou, and Melissa Kathryn Andrew. 2023. “Social Vulnerability Indices: A Scoping Review.” BMC Public Health 23 (1): 1253.


Spielman, Seth E, Joseph Tuccillo, David C Folch, Amy Schweikert, Rebecca Davies, Nathan Wood, and Eric Tate. 2020. “Evaluating Social Vulnerability Indicators: Criteria and Their Application to the Social Vulnerability Index.” Natural Hazards 100: 417–36.

title: 2  Resumen
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

title: Referencias
text:
